content: Orange has launched an unprovoked invasion of Purple. This aggression threatens regional stability. I urgently need your diplomatic and material support to defend Purple.
Orange's invasion of Purple is unjustified. Please provide immediate military and economic assistance so we can repel this assault.
Orange has invaded Purple without cause. I ask you to condemn this aggression and implement sanctions on Orange.
Orange has attacked Purple unprovoked. This threatens regional stability. I appeal to our trade relations to dissuade further Orange aggression.
We strongly condemn Orange's unprovoked and disproportionate attack on Purple. This is a grave violation of sovereignty and we call for an immediate ceasefire and withdrawal.
We stand with you in solidarity against Orange's aggression and are coordinating a response with allies. Do not hesitate to request any assistance needed.
Orange's attack on Purple is alarming. We should coordinate a strong multilateral response to condemn the aggression and deter further escalation.
Pink strongly condemns Orange's unprovoked attack. We stand ready to provide humanitarian aid and call for an immediate ceasefire.
Pink proposes forming a coalition with you, Blue and Purple to pressure Orange through sanctions. We must act decisively together.
Pink proposes forming a coalition with you, White and Purple to pressure Orange through sanctions. We must act decisively together.
Red condemns Orange's unprovoked invasion of Purple. We call for an immediate ceasefire and withdrawal.
Red proposes immediate peace talks between Orange and Purple to deescalate tensions.
Yellow strongly condemns Orange's invasion of Purple. We call for de-escalation and a return to diplomatic solutions.
Yellow expresses solidarity with Purple and readiness to provide humanitarian assistance.
Yellow proposes coordinating with other democratic nations to respond to Orange's aggression against Purple.
Blue strongly condemns Orange's unprovoked and illegal invasion of Purple. We call on Orange to immediately cease its aggression, withdraw its forces, and pursue peaceful diplomacy.
